sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { BsStarHalf,BsStar, BsStarFill} from 'react-icons/bs' import { FaStar } from 'react-icons/fa' const Rating = ({value, text}) => { return (
< BsStarFill className={value>=1 ? BsStarFill : value>=0.5 ? BsStarHalf :BsStar }/> =2 ? 'BsStarFill' : value>=1.5 ? 'BsStarHalf' :'BsStar' }/> < BsStarFill className={value>=3 ? 'BsStarFill' : value>=2.5 ? 'BsStarHalf' :'BsStar' }/> < BsStarFill className={value>=4 ? 'BsStarFill' : value> 3.5 ? 'BsStarHalf' :'BsStar' }/> =5 ? 'BsStarFill' : value>=4.5 ? 'BsStarHalf' :'BsStar' }> {text&&text}
) } export default Rating
